hero.title: Move from Reactive Defense to Proactive Resolution
hero.subtitle: Saras redefines litigation management with end-to-end automation—detecting, analyzing, and managing legal disputes across jurisdictions and departments, so your team is always one step ahead.

features.title: Key Capabilities
features.subtitle: Automate your entire legal workflow—from risk identification to courtroom-ready documentation.

items.title: Automated Case Detection
items.description: Saras scans court databases, public registries, regulator websites, and internal records to identify new legal notices, petitions, or adverse mentions relevant to your business—often before they are formally served.

items.title: AI-Powered Drafting & Case Building
items.description: From show-cause notices to writ petitions, Saras reads the documents, understands the legal grounds, and generates customized drafts using statutory language, relevant case laws, and your company's legal posture.

items.title: Centralized Case Management
items.description: All notices, filings, responses, and hearing updates are organized in one centralized dashboard with role-based access, assignment tracking, and internal collaboration tools—ensuring every stakeholder knows the case status in real time.

items.title: Escalation & Risk Alerts
items.description: Get automated alerts for high-risk matters based on issue type, monetary value, or jurisdiction. Saras flags delayed responses or approaching hearing dates so that nothing is missed, even across distributed teams.

items.title: Precedent & Judgment Intelligence
items.description: Access a curated repository of prior case laws, internal decisions, and regulator rulings. Saras recommends applicable legal precedents based on the nature of the current litigation, strengthening your response strategy.

detailSection.title: Draft Responses in Minutes, Not Weeks
detailSection.description: When a notice or case is identified, Saras extracts the facts, understands the legal grounds, checks your internal records, and generates a contextually accurate first draft. This includes formatted responses, annexures, cited cases, and optional legal opinions. Your legal team reviews, edits, and finalizes—not starts from scratch—freeing time for higher-value legal strategy.

cta.title: Never Be Caught Off Guard Again.
cta.subtitle: Equip your legal, tax, and compliance teams with the intelligence to proactively detect, assess, and respond to legal challenges. Saras transforms litigation from a burden into a strategic asset.
